deleteTestimonialModal.areYouSure:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a confirmation modal asking if the user is sure about deleting a testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring -> Testimonials List -> Revealed Testimonial -> Delete Testimonial Modal (heading)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to delete a testimonial and the confirmation modal appears.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to delete this testimonial?"
deleteTestimonialModal.deleteTestimonial:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the button to confirm the deletion of a testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring -> Testimonials List -> Revealed Testimonial -> Delete Testimonial Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: In the delete testimonial confirmation modal, to proceed with deletion.
**Technical Context**: This button submits the form to delete the testimonial.
**Current English**: "Delete testimonial"
deleteTestimonialModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the button to cancel the deletion of a testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring -> Testimonials List -> Revealed Testimonial -> Delete Testimonial Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: In the delete testimonial confirmation modal, to close the modal without deleting.
**Technical Context**: This button closes the modal without performing any action.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
optionsDropdown.options:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an icon indicating more options.
**UI Location**: Mentoring -> Testimonials List -> Revealed Testimonial -> Options Dropdown (icon alt text)
**When Users See This**: When the options dropdown button is visible.
**Technical Context**: Used as the `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component.
**Current English**: "Options"
optionsDropdown.deleteTestimonial:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the button within the options dropdown to initiate the deletion of a testimonial.
**UI Location**: Mentoring -> Testimonials List -> Revealed Testimonial -> Options Dropdown (menu item)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the options dropdown for a testimonial.
**Technical Context**: This button triggers the opening of the `DeleteTestimonialModal`.
**Current English**: "Delete testimonial"
